text: Danesi is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Anna Danesi, Italian female volleyball player * Bryan Danesi, Chilean footballer * Fabien Danesi, French art historian, lecturer in theory and practice of photography * Marcel Danesi, current Professor of Semiotics and Linguistic Anthropology at the University of Toronto * Tess Danesi, American sex educator, blogger, and writer of BDSM erotica
title: Danesi
